module.name: themeinstallator
module.description: Export or Install a theme and its modules on your shop
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Export or Install a theme and its modules on your shop.

module.name: moneybookers
module.description: Secure online payments for your business. Take advantage of a modern, flexible, and optimized payment solution- all with one contract, one integration and free setup
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Secure online payments for your business. Take advantage of a modern, flexible, and optimized payment solution- all with one contract, one integration and free setup.
module.additional_description: Free and quick setupAccess credit cards, 20+ local payment methods and support for over 80 banksTake advantage of the Skrill multi-currency account, giving you access to 40+ currenciesHigh-security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktopConnect with millions of Skrill account holders

module.name: fedexcarrier
module.description: Offer your customers different delivery methods with Fedex!
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Offer your customers different delivery methods with Fedex!

module.name: prestafraud
module.description: Protect your business, get help to make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Protect your business, get help to make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Protect your store: stay up-to-date on security to prevent your activity from bad intentions.Offer scoring possibilities: get a scoring for each order to evaluate how risky it can be.

module.name: uspscarrier
module.description: Calculates shipping rates for United States Postal Service for Domestic shipping within the USA
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Calculates shipping rates for United States Postal Service for Domestic shipping within the USA.

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: The Update Assistant module helps you backup, update and restore your PrestaShop store. With just a few clicks, you can move to the latest version of PrestaShop with confidence
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: The Update Assistant module helps you backup, update and restore your PrestaShop store. With just a few clicks, you can move to the latest version of PrestaShop with confidence.
module.additional_description: The Update Assistant module enables you to:Update your store: enjoy the latest features and improvements to the user experience introduced by new versions of PrestaShop.Backup your store: make backups before updating to protect your store in case of technical failure, cyber-attack or human error.Restore your store: easily restore your store to a previous state in case of a problems during or after the update, ensuring business continuity. Advantages of the module:Saves you time updating, backing up and restoring.Guides you through the key steps of these processes.Secures your store with preventive backups before updating.Minimises risk with automatic compatibility checks.Keeps your store compliant with officially supported versions.Saves you money by simplifying updates.The Update Assistant module is an essential tool for users who want to keep their PrestaShop store up to date easily and efficiently.

module.name: gamification
module.description: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Keep up with your store: benefit from PrestaShop’s wide range of features and learn to use them all.Explore all possibilities: with the click of a button, be able to see sales-enhancing features you might be missing out on.

module.name: gsitemap
module.description: Generate your Google sitemap file with this module, and keep it up-to-date
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Generate your Google sitemap file with this module, and keep it up-to-date.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Optimize your SEO: enhance your search results on all search engines (Google, Bing, Yahoo, etc.) with this module that will facilitate indexation of your pages and products by search engines.

module.name: dateofdelivery
module.description: Display expected delivery dates to customers and therefore increase your conversion rate
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Display expected delivery dates to customers and therefore increase your conversion rate.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Ensure the transparency of your business: give reassurance by keeping your customers informed of your delivery dates.Increase your conversion rate: you will make your customers confident about purchasing on your online shop.

module.name: crossselling
module.description: Adds a "Customers who bought this product also bought..." section to every product page
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a "Customers who bought this product also bought..." section to every product page.

module.name: cronjobs
module.description: Focus on your business and do not lose time working on minor tasks: automate it!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Focus on your business and do not lose time working on minor tasks: automate it!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Save time: turn simple jobs into programmed tasks you won’t have to care about too much.Schedule your needs: and make it automatically done, easy-peasy!Handle all these tasks: have it all listed at the same place to better manage each job and create new ones if needed.

module.name: lengow
module.description: Lengow allows you to easily export your product catalogue from your PrestaShop store to sell on 70+ Marketplaces, advertise on 1,400+ marketing channels, and monitor prices of competitors and reseller
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Lengow allows you to easily export your product catalogue from your PrestaShop store to sell on 70+ Marketplaces, advertise on 1,400+ marketing channels, and monitor prices of competitors and resellers across the web.
module.additional_description: Effortlessly manage product listings with centralised and automated feed activities across marketplaces and marketing channelsExpand your online presence and reach new customers on niche or popular marketplacesOptimise your catalogue to improve your data quality and product visibility across all channelsCentralise order management and keep track of their inventory in a single platformLeverage price intelligence data from your competitors to optimise your pricing and marketing campaign strategies

module.name: jmarketplace
module.description: Create your own marketplace allowing your customers register as sellers for sell their products in exchange for a commission
module.author: JA Modules
module.description_full: Create your own marketplace allowing your customers register as sellers for sell their products in exchange for a commission.
module.additional_description: We are quality leaders and PrestaShop experts with more than 15 years of experience in the sector and we can guarantee that this product can help you a lot to get the goal you want. We know and like what we do, that's why we offer you the best of us, in a very complete product and at the best price. Our module, your trust marketplace. This module is synonymous with analysis, constant work and innovation. We always listen to your suggestions and requests to improve it and make a more competent, complete product with a good technical support team that is attentive to solve all doubts and problems, always giving the best possible result. Benefits for administrator Expansion catalog with products from other sellers.More sales possibilities.More offer for customers.Compatible with any payment method.All customer purchases are received by the market. When appropriate, vendor commissions can be paid.Very complete management of sellers, products, commissions, etc.Very complete control panel or dashboard where you will be able to see all the market advances.Fixed commission per sale.Variable commission by seller, category or levels (Bronze, Silver and Gold).Super complete configuration per page or functionality. You will not have to modify the code to enable or disable functions on the front.Communication system between client, seller and administrator through the platform.Compatible with most of the available themes. It is ideal to choose a theme that it has been developed with Bootstrap 3 technology or higher. Benefits for the seller Easy and intuitive product management.Export and import products en masse.Management of the seller profile.Commission history.Order history and management.Creates your own carriers and shipping rates.Selection of the preferred payment method to collect your commissions.Graph of commissions received.Request for withdrawal of funds.Centralized marketplace message box.

module.name: magnalister
module.description: Effortlessly sell on Amazon, eBay, and various global marketplaces straight from your shop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Effortlessly sell on Amazon, eBay, and various global marketplaces straight from your shop. magnalister streamlines uploading products and automates follow-up tasks like order imports, price-inventory matching, and beyond for a smoother operation.
module.additional_description: Easily integrate your PrestaShop with major online marketplaces like Amazon, eBay, and others through magnalister, and take advantage of essential features including product uploads, order imports, price and inventory synchronization, order status reconciliation, invoice creation and distribution, along with numerous automation capabilities. As of April 2024, we support a diverse array of platforms: Amazon, eBay, Cdiscount, Rakuten FR, Etsy, OTTO, METRO, Kaufland.de, Ricardo, hood.de, plus price comparison sites such as Check24 and idealo. We're constantly expanding our network, adding more high-traffic national and international marketplaces, and regularly enhancing the functionality of the magnalister PrestaShop Addon to meet your evolving needs. Discover the full potential of magnalister with a 30-day free trial, and explore the complete suite of features without any cost!

module.name: oneandonehosting
module.description: At IONOS you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy The default offer is for the USA
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: At IONOS you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy The default offer is for the USA.  Please click here to benefit from the UK special offer and here if you are based in Canada
module.additional_description: 24/7 expert support offering practical help with the application you're usingMaximum availability of your website thanks to georedundant hosting in two geographically separate data centers

module.name: smartsupp
module.description: Drive your online sales through conversations, and automate sales with Smartsupp
module.author: Smartsupp
module.description_full: Drive your online sales through conversations, and automate sales with Smartsupp. We offer everything you need to grow your business: chatbot, live chat, Mira AI shopping assistant and much more you can use to engage your visitors at the right time.
module.additional_description: Jumpstart your sales and boost conversions with Smartsupp. Our packages offer everything you need: chatbot, live chat and Mira AI shopping assistant to help you turn visitors into customers. Automate responses to repetitive questions and provide a personal touch when it matters the most. Gain insights into your customer service with accurate statistics – track customer satisfaction, agents' performance efficiency, and more. If you want to use one of the world's most trusted live chat and AI chatbot apps, use Smartsupp. We currently power up over 100,000 webshops and websites so they can:Chat with customers and build powerful relationships. Our easy-to-install, fast chatbot is complemented by Messenger, email and WhatsApp, so every conversation is accessible via our mobile apps.Convert visitors into customers by running powerful lead gen campaigns with automated messages and chatbots.Automate up to 80% of customer queries with Mira, our powerful AI chatbot, available 24/7 and always ready to assist.Understand the conversation flow, how happy your customers are with your team and offering, and what they ask about – but also who converts and requires your attention. What our users say about us? "We have 23 live chat agents available from 6 a.m. to midnight. Most frequently, customers text in the evening, though. Thanks to Smartsupp's solutions, we sell 900 cars a month."—Jan Duchoň, AAA AUTO "One of the advantages of Smartsupp chat for us is that it is always visible at a glance when browsing the e-shop. Our customers know that we are there for them 24/7, and they can contact us at any time – whether they use the chatbot or the live chat."—Jan Kučera, ASKO - NÁBYTEK "Smartsupp helps us to make our online shop even more successful! After a simple installation, we immediately had the first customer with a question, who then ordered straight away."—Oke Harms, Kickerkult.de "With Smartsupp we use one chat in several shops! Thanks to them, we have been able to improve our contact with customers. Communication is instant and convenient for both us and the customers."—Katarzyna, Wujo.pl

badge.label: Customer satisfaction: Partner of the year

module.name: crisp
module.description: Crisp is the all-in-one platform for customer support dedicated to Prestashop merchants
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Crisp is the all-in-one platform for customer support dedicated to Prestashop merchants. The platform comes with a live chat widget, an AI Chatbot and many other features that deeply integrates with your Prestashop online store.
module.additional_description: Transform your customer service into a new acquisition's channel Crisp is a multichannel customer experience platform that helps online store to centralize inbound messages to land into one inbox, allowing merchants to avoid switching back and forth between Facebook, Instagram, Email Inbox or WhatsApp and phone calls. Through a powerful data synchronization between Prestashop and Crisp, merchants can create personnalized and unique support experience. No matter customer's state, retailers will aways stay ahead. The platform offers ready-to-use tools that will make online merchants ready and powerful today, not in a month: Sales and FAQ chatbot templates, empowered by AI and trained on product data are designed to increase revenue and answer repetitive customer's questions. Through a flat-rate pricing, merchants using Crisp for Prestashop can preserve their margins while scaling their customer support process. All-in-all, Crisp for Prestashop doesn't only provide a live chat, an AI Chatbot or a shared inbox: It's full suite of tools dedicated at making online merchants more efficient in their daily customers' relationship tasks. How does Crisp stands out from the crowd?- 55% resolution rate powered by Crisp AI Chatbot- 100% no-code solution to empower teams from any sector- Lightweight chat widget made not to slowdown website loading speed- Free mobile and desktop iOs & Android app- Flat-rate pricing on all our plans- In-house AI models for better privacy-driven companies Simple things you can do to scale your customer support in less than 5 minutes- Decrease bounce rate and CPC with proactive and personnalized chat messages- Improve average number of conversations per agent by creating templated message that leverage dynamic data shared through Prestashop data- Connect channels such as emails, Instagram DMs or Messenger to your Crisp inbox- Build bots to automate repetitive questions on any channels thanks to ready-to-use chatbot templates- Train AI models on custom data such as website data, product data or conversational data. Numbers behind Crisp- 500 000 customers around the world- 50+ languages available- 210 000 000 users each month- 24/5 customer support available in 5 different languages

module.name: zendesk
module.description: Contextualize your customer interactions by seeing their latest orders when managing tickets inside Zendesk
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Contextualize your customer interactions by seeing their latest orders when managing tickets inside Zendesk. Order details such as status, total, creation date, products names and quantities, tracking number are all visible from within Zendesk.
module.additional_description: This integration will save customer support agents time and contextualize interactions as they no longer need to switch between Prestashop and Zendesk's interfaces to link a ticket to customer orders.

module.name: stripe_official
module.description: Stripe includes many features to increase revenue and create a frictionless customer experience including support for more than 40 payment methods; buy now, pay later methods like Klarna and Clearpay;
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Stripe includes many features to increase revenue and create a frictionless customer experience including support for more than 40 payment methods; buy now, pay later methods like Klarna and Clearpay; and Link, an accelerated checkout. What used to take hundreds of engineering hours can be done by businesses in as little as an afternoon.
module.additional_description: Give customers a best-in-class payment experience while you remain focused on your core business. Businesses using the Stripe checkout saw 11.9% more revenue on average. Stripe can help customers:Increase conversion.Expand your customer base.Lower costs.Reduce time and effort. Increase conversion Stripe uses algorithms trained on billions of data points to display and order payment methods you’ve enabled to maximize conversion for each customer on each page. Expand your customer base Convert customers who might otherwise abandon their cart with buy now, pay later options like Klarna and Clearpay and local payment methods like Cartes Bancaires, BACS direct debit, Blik, Bizum, and bank transfers.   Lower costs Reduce transaction costs with lower-cost payment methods. Save money and fight fraud with Stripe Radar, which works seamlessly with the Stripe platform.  Reduce time and effort Launch payment methods in minutes, not days, and simplify operations and management with unified monitoring, reporting, and payouts. Future-proof your business by configuring new payment methods as soon as they are supported.

module.name: ps_emailsmanager
module.description: Adapt your emails’ design to your visual identity or type of business
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adapt your emails’ design to your visual identity or type of business.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Easy import purchased modules: import the zip file into the module’s configuration interface and you’re all set! You can use your new email template immediately.Manage your email content: content and translations automatically retrieved for traditional transaction emails (more than 30 templates).Access your emails in one-click: store default email templates in PrestaShop and purchased templates.

module.name: trustpilot
module.description: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform. Automatically invite customers to leave reviews and showcase your store's rating onsite with a drag-and-drop tool.
module.additional_description: Trustpilot is an open-to-all reviews platform where consumers are heard by businesses, and where businesses can earn consumer trust. Grow your business with genuine content that comes directly from the people who matter most—your customers. Trustpilot for PrestaShop Trustpilot’s integration for PrestaShop lets merchants trigger service and product review invitations to customers automatically. Use the TrustBox tool to drag-and-drop reviews and ratings widgets on your site at key conversion points. Read on for what more you can do with a Trustpilot account. Grow a trusted brand Invite your customers to share feedback at the ideal moment. Authentic content generated from your customers helps drive your SEO ranking and increases traffic to your site.Collect reviews on your Trustpilot profile pages, which frequently appear on the first page of search engines.Grow on Google with verified reviews that count toward Google Seller Ratings. Product reviews enhance and qualify your product pages for review snippets in organic search. Increase purchasing conversion and grow revenue Turn real reviews from real customers into real conversion drivers. Showcase reviews across your website when consumers are actively looking to make a purchase decision.Get consumers talking by sharing your reviews anywhere you engage with consumers—paid ads, email, social, and out-of-home. Give potential customers the confidence they need throughout their journey.Showcase reviews in ad creative without design skills with our Image Generator. Increase customer retention and maximize LTV Learn from customers to optimize and improve your service and products. Identify trends in customer sentiment across product inventory, customer service, shipping, price, and more.Respond to reviews and prove you take customer feedback seriously to turn first time buyers into repeat customers and your best advocates.Keep customers coming back with an ever-improving product selection. Product Attributes ratings help you understand your products from your customer’s point-of-view. Get started with a free accountWhether you’re just getting started or you’re already an expert at engaging and building trust with your customers, we can help. A free account gives businesses the tools needed to start collecting, managing, and showcasing reviews. Sign up for a Standard Plan to upgrade your profile page, invite more customer reviews, access the Customer Success team, learn from detailed review analysis, use more TrustBox widgets onsite, produce marketing assets, and get the option to upgrade with Add-on Modules. Read more about our Plans and Add-on Modules: business.trustpilot.com/plans

module.name: acutrackauthtoken
module.displayName: Acutrack Fulfillment with specialization in publishing
module.description: Acutrack is a technology-driven, e-commerce fulfillment company - with a specialization in publishing books and media-on-demand
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Acutrack is a technology-driven, e-commerce fulfillment company - with a specialization in publishing books and media-on-demand
module.additional_description: Acutrack is a technology-driven, e-commerce fulfillment company - with a specialization in publishing books and media-on-demand. We are one of the few companies that offer both fulfillment and publishing services, allowing our customers to seamlessly integrate all of their logistical needs with just one partner. We are a perfect fit for anyone who has content to fulfill and publish, such as self-publishers, marketers, and trainers. Acutrack is your behind-the-scenes logistics partner, letting you focus on just one thing - growing your business! Reliable PartnerWhen it comes to your inventory, customers, and orders, you want a partner who has a strong track record and is transparent in its dealings. With 25-years of experience, Acutrack is a reliable partner. Don't just take our word for it! Check out Acutrack reviews on Trustpilot. Book Fulfillment Made EasyAcutrack's comprehensive suite of book fulfillment and distribution services helps businesses deliver their books directly to consumers (B2C) or to retail and other marketplaces like Amazon (B2B) etc.Print small or large runs, using offset or digital technology to meet your forecastTeam of experts in graphic design, print, kitting & packagingWidest range of book trim size & binding options Fulfillment driven by TechnologyAcutrack seamlessly integrates with Prestashop and over 100 other eCommerce platforms. Acutrack delivers an error-free solution to you and your customers. withAn online dashboard that provides 24 x 7 access andA strong API support, Unparalleled Customer ServiceDedicated and personalized supportConsultative business partner Full transparency
